meanings.definition: A garment worn for sleeping, typically a loose-fitting dress or shirt.
meanings.sent1: She put on her cozy nighty before going to bed.
meanings.sent2: I bought a new nighty for my pajama collection.
meanings.sent3: The nighty danced in the wind on the clothesline.
meanings.sent4: Her nighty was a soft cloud embracing her body.
meanings.sent5: The nighty smelled of lavender and dreams.

meanings.definition: Of or relating to the night.
meanings.sent1: The nighty sky was filled with twinkling stars.
meanings.sent2: We took a nighty walk under the moonlight.
meanings.sent3: The nighty owl hooted softly in the darkness.
meanings.sent4: The nighty silence enveloped the sleeping town.
meanings.sent5: The nighty air was cool and refreshing on my skin.
